thread.title: Researchers Work on Procedure to ‘Brew Blood’ to Fight Blood Disorders
thread.title_full: Researchers Work on Procedure to ‘Brew Blood’ to Fight Blood Disorders

author: Katherine Rodriguez
title: Researchers Work on Procedure to ‘Brew Blood’ to Fight Blood Disorders
text: A bag of dog's blood stored in a refrigerator is held at the clinic and polyclinic for small domestic animals in Berlin, Germany, 14 January 2013. The animal clinic at the Free University Berlin was the first with a bloodbank for dogs in 1996 and since then also has a cat bloodbank at well. Photo by: Stephanie Pilick/picture-alliance/dpa/AP Images
